Title: Prohibits the sale of sodium nitrate and sodium nitrite to any person under the age of twenty-one
Summary: Prohibits the sale of sodium nitrate and sodium nitrite to any person under the age of twenty-one.
LawCode: Add ยง399-hhh, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to prohibiting the sale of sodium nitrate and sodium nitrite to any person under the age of twenty-one
